channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Google’s Next Antitrust Trial Could Make Online Ads Less Annoying
item.description: Google will be in court on Monday to face allegations of an ad tech monopoly. Experts say that a DOJ win could create a better browsing future.

item.title: Alpha Partners raises $153M third fund for pro-rata investments
item.description: Steve Brotman started Alpha Partners in 2014 with a novel idea at the time: investing alongside early-stage VCs to help preserve their ownership in pr...

item.title: What You Need to Know About Grok AI and Your Privacy
item.description: xAI's generative AI tool, Grok AI, is unhinged compared to its competitors. It's also scooping up a ton of data people post on X. Here's how to keep y...

item.title: TechCrunch Minute: Another blow to the Internet Archive’s lending library
item.description: The Internet Archive’s online lending library recently suffered a big defeat in court. The organization is best known for operating the Wayback Machin...

item.title: Apple Event Live Blog: All the iPhone 16 News as It Happens
item.description: Get ready for some fresh hardware. Follow along live as Apple debuts the iPhone 16 lineup, new Apple Watches, and a few other surprises.

item.title: Apple Event 2024: iPhone 16, Apple Intelligence and all the other expected ‘Glowtime’ reveals
item.description: Apple's Glowtime iPhone event will include the iPhone 16, but may also feature new AirPods, a new Apple Watch and possibly even new Macs. © 2024 TechC...

item.title: How to Buy an Electric Bike (2024): Classes, Range, Repairs
item.description: Here’s what the experts want you to know before making your first electric bike purchase.

item.title: Progress acquires file management platform ShareFile for $875M

item.title: The Best 2-in-1 Laptops to Flip Between Work and Play (2024), Tested and Reviewed
item.description: These 2-in-1 computers upgrade the norm with touchscreen displays, 360-degree hinges, and detachable keyboards.

item.title: Announcing the final agenda for the Space Stage at TechCrunch Disrupt 2024
